radiographic_examinations.findings: Choledocholithiasis and 2 stones at the level of ampulla causing extrahepatic and intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. CBD measuring 12 mm. Minimal enhancement of intrahepatic biliary duct suggestive of mild cholangitis. No intrahepatic abscess. Atrophic pancreas with minimal dilatation of pancreatic duct. Distended gall bladder with no definite gallstones noted. Punctate cyst in upper pole of left kidney. Degenerative changes in the spine, most pronounced at the lumbar spine.
